dct_title_s: Energy map of the Caribbean / produced by the Petroleum Economist Ltd., a division of Euromoney Global Ltd. ; in association with the National Gas Company of Trinidad and Tobago Limited ; designed, produced, and distributed by the Petroleum Economist Ltd ; produced, designed, and researched by K. Fuller and P. Bush ; satellite imagery courtesy of CGG NPA Satellite Mapping.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and shading. Depths shown by bathymetric tints and shading. "Published September 2014." Includes legend, text, color illustrations, 2 ancillary maps, statistical tables, and graphs. Shows the crude oil, coal, electricity, natural gas and LNG of the countries in Caribbean Area. Accompanies: Petroleum Economist, v.81, no.1, January 2015.
